commands.name: az sql mi-arc config add
commands.summary: Add a value for a json path in a config file.
examples: az sql mi-arc config add --path custom/spec.json --json-values 'spec.storage={"accessMode":"ReadWriteOnce","className":"managed-premium","size":"10Gi"}'

commands.name: az sql mi-arc config init
commands.summary: Initialize the CRD and specification files for a SQL managed instance.

commands.name: az sql mi-arc config patch
commands.summary: Patch a config file based on a json patch file.

commands.name: az sql mi-arc config remove
commands.summary: Remove a value for a json path in a config file.
examples: az sql mi-arc config remove --path custom/spec.json --json-path '.spec.storage'

commands.name: az sql mi-arc config replace
commands.summary: Replace a value for a json path in a config file.
examples: az sql mi-arc config replace --path custom/spec.json --json-values '$.spec.endpoints[?(@.name=="Controller")].port=30080'
az sql mi-arc config replace --path custom/spec.json --json-values 'spec.storage={"accessMode":"ReadWriteOnce","className":"managed-premium","size":"10Gi"}'
